text: John Rigmayden (1515/16–1557), of Wedacre in Garstang, Lancashire, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Lancashire in October 1553. ==References== Category:1510s births Category:1557 deaths Category:English MPs 1553 (Mary I) Category:Members of the Parliament of England (pre-1707) for Lancashire
title: John Rigmayden
